text: Ojo nadidaand, duruƣsumorandagoni ruzi qijomat, ki haroina, Mo oʙro ʙa zamini xusku ʙegijoh ravona mesozem, to kistzorho ʙirujonem corpojonason va xudason az on ʙixurand? Ojo in ne'mathoro ʙo casmoni xud nameʙinand? Pas ʙidonand, ki Alloh taolo in guna cizhoero, ki padid ovard, alʙatta, ʙar zinda gardondani murdaho qodir ast
